message: I'm excited to sell you this great product! I'm thinking of a price of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we meet at $125 instead?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $125. How about we meet at $110?
I'm willing to compromise, but $110 is still a bit too low for me. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not willing to go up to $130. How about we meet at $120?
